Attribute.AttributeName: System.Windows.TemplatePart(Name="PART_FindToolBarHost", Type=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl))
System.Windows.TemplatePart(Name="PART_ContentHost", Type=typeof(System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer))

summary.span: 表示文件檢視控制項，這個控制項可以裝載已編頁的 內容，例如 。

span.span: Represents a document viewing control that can host paginated content such as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 自訂 DocumentViewer 控制項Customizing the DocumentViewer Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [DocumentViewer 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [DocumentViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

summary.span: 以一個縮放步驟來縮小文件內容。

span.span: Zooms out of the document content by one zoom step.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是縮放層級的增量。The following are the zoom level increments. `5% 100% 1200%` `10% 125% 1600%` `25% 150% 2000%` `33% 175% 2400%` `50% 200% 3200%` `66% 300% 4000%` `75% 400% 5000%` `800%` 最小縮放層級為 5%。The minimum zoom level is 5%. 達到的最小縮放層級之後，沒有更多的作用。After the minimum zoom level is reached, has no more effect. 屬性會傳回`false`到達的最小縮放層級。The property returns `false` when the minimum zoom level is reached.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExtentHeight As Double
public: property double ExtentHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得已編頁文件的整體垂直高度。

span.span: Gets the overall vertical height of the paginated document.

value.span: 以與裝置無關的像素指定之已分頁內容的整體垂直高度。

span.span: The overall vertical height of the paginated content specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對垂直頁面的排列，所有頁面高度的總和，且包含頁面之間的間距。For vertical page arrangements, is the sum of all the page heights and includes the space between pages. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

value.span: 內容配置區域的目前水平寬度 (以與裝置無關的像素為指定單位)。

span.span: The current horizontal width of the content layout area specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 0.0。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對水平頁面的排列，所有頁面寬度的總和，且包含頁面之間的間距。For horizontal page arrangements, is the sum of all the page widths and includes the space between pages. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double HorizontalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.HorizontalOffset : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定水平捲動位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal scroll position.

value.span: 目前的水平捲軸位置 (以與裝置無關的像素為指定單位)。

span.span: The current horizontal scroll position specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 初始預設值為 0.0。

span.span: The initial default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性會導致控制項捲動至指定的水平位移。Setting the property causes the control to scroll to the specified horizontal offset. 可見內容區域左邊緣起的水平位移。The horizontal offset is measured from the left edge of the visible content area. 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您無法使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`) 已啟用針對許多其他 「 寬度 」 或 「 水平 」 屬性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**||

exception.span: 要設定的指定值為負數。

span.span: The value specified to set is negative.

summary.span: 取得或設定頁面之間的水名間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal space between pages.

value.span: 與裝置無關像素中指定頁面之間的水平空間。

span.span: The horizontal space between displayed pages specified in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 10.0。

span.span: The default is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性調整頁面的水平間距。Setting the property adjusts the horizontal spacing between pages. 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您無法使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`) 已啟用針對許多其他 「 寬度 」 或 「 水平 」 屬性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

exception.span: 要設定的指定值為負數。

span.span: The value specified to set is negative.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double VerticalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.VerticalOffset : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定垂直捲動位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical scroll position.

value.span: 目前的垂直捲軸位置位移 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: The current vertical scroll position offset in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須是非負位移的值設定。 must be set with non-negative offset values. 設定為負數值會引發例外狀況。Setting a negative value raises an exception. 可見內容區域頂端起的垂直位移。The vertical offset is measured from the top of the visible content area. 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您無法使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`) 已啟用針對許多其他 「 高度 」 或 「 垂直 」 屬性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

Public Shared ReadOnly VerticalOffsetProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double VerticalPageSpacing { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.VerticalPageSpacing : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定所顯示頁面之間的垂直間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical spacing between displayed pages.

value.span: 所顯示頁面之間的垂直間距，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

span.span: The vertical space between displayed pages in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 10.0。

span.span: The default is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性調整為指定值的頁面之間的垂直間距。Setting the property adjusts the vertical spacing between pages to the specified value. 值必須是非負數。The value must be non-negative. 將此屬性設為負數值將會引發例外狀況。Setting this property to a negative value will raise an exception. 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您無法使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`) 已啟用針對許多其他 「 高度 」 或 「 垂直 」 屬性。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly VerticalPageSpacingProperty As DependencyProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小和排列檢視，以顯示每個頁面的縮圖預覽。 sizes and arranges the view to display a thumbnail preview of each page. 下表顯示此命令相關聯的鍵盤快速鍵。The following table shows the keyboard shortcut key associated with this command. ||| |-|-| |快速鍵Shortcut Key|[無][none]|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Zoom { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Zoom : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定文件的縮放百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the document zoom percentage.

value.span: 縮放百分比表示為 5.0 到 5000.0 的值。

span.span: The zoom percentage expressed as a value, 5.0 to 5000.0.
The default is 100.0, which corresponds to 100.0%.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性可讓控制項以縮放至指定的值。Setting this property causes the control to zoom to the specified value. 屬性必須對應於百分比範圍 5.0 到 5000.0 %5.0 到 5000.0 （含） 之間的值。The property must be a value between 5.0 to 5000.0 (inclusive), which corresponds to a percentage range 5.0% to 5000.0%. 動作或需要配置更新的命令，可能會變更屬性設定。Actions or commands that require a layout update may change the property setting. 例如，變更的值，則呼叫方法，或叫用可能會導致設定，以變更。For example, changing the value of , calling the method, or invoking the can cause the setting to change. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
